plot outline: Watch the full movie, Pavitra, only on Eros Now. Pavitra a 1986 Indian Telugu film, directed by Vinay and produced by Mohan The film stars Rajendra Prasad, Bhanupriya, Chandra Mohan, Annapoorna, Y Vijaya in lead roles. The film had musical score by Krishna Chakra.
